mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product (product_title, product_price, product_description) VALUES(#{product_title}, #{product_price}, #{product_description})

INSERT INTO product (product_title, product_price, product_description, product_information, product_brand, product_type, product_carrier) VALUES(#{product_title}, #{product_price}, #{product_description}, #{product_information}, #{product_brand}, #{product_type}, #{product_carrier})
mapper.select: SELECT p.*, image_uuid, image_uploadPath, image_name, image_type, product_color FROM product AS p LEFT OUTER JOIN product_image AS i ON p.product_id = i.product_id LEFT OUTER JOIN product_colorList AS c on p.product_id = c.product_id WHERE p.product_id = #{product_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE product SET product_title = #{product_title}, product_price = #{product_price}, product_description = #{product_description}, product_information = #{product_information}, product_brand = #{product_brand}, product_type = #{product_type}, product_carrier= #{product_carrier} WHERE product_id = #{product_id}

SELECT p.*, image_uuid, image_uploadPath, image_name, image_type FROM (SELECT product_id, product_title, product_price, product_brand FROM product WHERE product_id>0 ORDER BY product_id DESC LIMIT #{amount}) p LEFT OUTER JOIN product_image AS i ON p.product_id = i.product_id AND i.product_id>0 AND image_type = 'mainImage'

SELECT p.*, image_uuid, image_uploadPath, image_name, image_type FROM (SELECT product_id, product_title, product_price FROM product WHERE product_id>0 LIMIT 2) p LEFT OUTER JOIN product_image AS i ON p.product_id = i.product_id AND i.product_id>0 AND image_type = 'mainImage'

SELECT w.*, image_uuid, image_uploadPath, image_name, image_type, p.product_title, p.product_price, p.product_brand FROM (SELECT product_id, count(*) AS wish_count FROM wishlist GROUP by product_id ORDER BY wish_count DESC, wishlist_id DESC LIMIT 3) w LEFT OUTER JOIN product_image AS i ON w.product_id = i.product_id AND w.product_id>0 AND image_type = 'mainImage' JOIN product AS p ON w.product_id = p.product_id AND w.product_id>0

SELECT p.*, image_uuid, image_uploadPath, image_name, image_type FROM (SELECT product_id, product_title, product_price, product_rating, product_brand FROM product ORDER BY product_rating DESC LIMIT 3) p LEFT OUTER JOIN product_image AS i ON p.product_id = i.product_id AND i.product_id>0 AND image_type = 'mainImage'
